TEXT.TITLE: TRIZEC COMPLETES OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: <Trizec Corp Ltd> said it completed its previously announced 171.25 mln dlr share offering consisting of five mln Class A subordinated voting ordinary shares at 34.25 dlrs per share. Reuter
